text: Menden (official name: Menden (Sauerland)) is a town in Märkischer Kreis in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. About 52,000 people live there. == Twin towns == Menden is twinned with: * Aire-sur-la-Lys, France * Ardres, France * Braine-l'Alleud, Belgium * Chalcis, Greece * Eisenberg, Germany * Flintshire, Wales, United Kingdom * Lestrem, France * Locon, France * Marœuil, France * Plungė, Lithuania == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Märkischer Kreis
title: Menden
